metadata.title: CVE-2021-37322 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: GCC c++filt v2.26 was discovered to contain a use-after-free vulnerability via the component cplus-dem.c.

notes.note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
